snippet: The Yankees called up the right-hander Alfredo Aceves from Class AAA Scranton/Wilkes-Barre and designated reliever Chris Leroux for assignment.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees called up the right-hander Alfredo Aceves from Class AAA Scranton/Wilkes-Barre and designated reliever Chris Leroux for assignment.

headline.main: Yankees Call Up Aceves From the Minors
headline.print_headline: Yankees Call Up Aceves From the Minors
